#summary Identifies the user interfaces associated with SitesWrapper.

= User Interfaces =

From an overall distributed product perspective, SitesWrapper provides the following user interfaces.
  # *Server Service Wrapper* _HTML_ only web page based end user interface
  # *Client Wrapper* _AJAX_ style web page based end user interface
  # *Android Configuration Client* provides an _Android app preferences API_ style end user interface thatâ€™s consistent with the end user experience in other Android apps including the system settings
  # *iOS Configuration Client* uses the _Cocoa preferences system_ (aka, the user defaults system) to provide an interface that's consistent with the user experience in other iOS apps
  # *Apps Script Configuration Client* uses a Google Apps _spreadsheet_ based user interface
